name: Wheel of Fortune
reversed_meaning: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

name: The Hanged Man
upright_meaning: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives

name: Temperance
reversed_meaning: Imbalance, excess, lack of long-term vision

name: The Tower
reversed_meaning: Fear of change, averting disaster, delaying the inevitable

name: The Sun
reversed_meaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

name: The Judgement
reversed_meaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

name: Three of Cups
reversed_meaning: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, ‘three’s a crowd’

name: Four of Cups
reversed_meaning: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment

name: Six of Cups
upright_meaning: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
reversed_meaning: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness

name: Seven of Cups
reversed_meaning: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices

name: Eight of Cups
reversed_meaning: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting

name: Nine of Cups
upright_meaning: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true

name: Ten of Cups
upright_meaning: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment

name: Ace of Swords
upright_meaning: Breakthroughs, clarity, sharp mind, new ideas
reversed_meaning: Inner clarity, clouded judgement, rethinking an idea

name: Six of Swords
upright_meaning: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage

name: Nine of Swords
reversed_meaning: Hope, recovery, reaching out, facing fears

name: Ten of Swords
upright_meaning: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
reversed_meaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end

name: Page of Swords
reversed_meaning: Deception, manipulation, all talk and no action

name: Knight of Swords
upright_meaning: Action, ambition, haste, driven to succeed

name: Queen of Swords
upright_meaning: Independent, unbiased judgment, clear boundaries, direct communication

name: King of Swords
upright_meaning: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth

name: Ace of Pentacles
upright_meaning: A new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance
reversed_meaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight

name: Four of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity mindset

name: Five of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation
reversed_meaning: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty

name: Six of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity

name: Seven of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Long-term view, perseverance, investment, sustainable results
reversed_meaning: Lack of reward, impatience, wasted effort

name: Eight of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Apprenticeship, mastery, skill development, hard work
reversed_meaning: Perfectionism, uninspired work, lack of focus

name: Nine of Pentacles
reversed_meaning: Self-worth issues, over-investment in work, hustling too hard

name: Ten of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success

name: Page of Pentacles
reversed_meaning: Lack of progress, procrastination, short-term focus

name: Queen of Pentacles
upright_meaning: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, working parent

name: Ace of Wands
reversed_meaning: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions,delays

name: Two of Wands
reversed_meaning: Personal goals, inner alignment, fear of unknown, lack of planning

name: Three of Wands
reversed_meaning: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays

name: Four of Wands
reversed_meaning: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others, transition

name: Five of Wands
reversed_meaning: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, tension release

name: Six of Wands
upright_meaning: Success, public recognition, progress, self- confidence
reversed_meaning: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace, egotism

name: Eight of Wands
upright_meaning: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment, air travel
reversed_meaning: Delays, frustration, resisting change, internal alignment

name: Nine of Wands
upright_meaning: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries
reversed_meaning: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia

name: Ten of Wands
upright_meaning: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
reversed_meaning: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release

name: Page of Wands
upright_meaning: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
reversed_meaning: Newly-formed ideas, redirecting energy, self- limiting beliefs, a spiritual path

name: Knight of Wands
upright_meaning: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
reversed_meaning: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration

name: Queen of Wands
upright_meaning: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
reversed_meaning: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, re-establish sense of self

name: King of Wands
upright_meaning: Natural-born leader, grand visions, long-term success
reversed_meaning: Poor leadership, aggressive goals, high expectations, personal direction
